full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement

### Project Title

* **English Title**: Field Support Services Project (FSSP) Burkina Faso - Benin
* **French Title**: Projet d’appuis de service sur le terrain (PSAT) Burkina Faso - Bénin

### Tender Details

* **Tender Reference Number**: cb-8966-49775643
* **Publication Date**: 2023-09-13
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-11-07T14:00:00
* **Tender Status**: Expired

### Project Overview

The Field Support Services Project (FSSP) aims to provide local technical expertise to support Burkina Faso and Benin. The project will manage the Local Reimbursable Expenses funding envelope, if authorized and required.

### Project Objectives

The FSSP will facilitate Canada's commitments to global health, including sexual and reproductive health and rights, and education of women and girls in developing countries. The project will provide access to local expertise to inform decision-making and support the preparation of development strategies. Services will be aligned with Canada's Feminist International Assistance Policy (FIAP) and the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs).

### Project Scope

The FSSP will provide a range of services, including:

* Advising government counterparts
* Analysis and monitoring
* Advice related to Canada's priority sectors, including development and humanitarian assistance

### Trading Agreements

The tender is open to bidders from countries participating in the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Regions of Opportunity

* Burkina Faso
* Benin

### Points of Contact

* **Christian Meghaizel**, Procurement Officer
* Email: [Christian.Meghaizel@international.gc.ca](mailto:Christian.Meghaizel@international.gc.ca)
* Phone: (613) 791-8548
* Address
